title: getting lp back?
body: it's not the biggest deal in the world but yesterday i encountered a bugsplat in a solo/duo ranked game. now when i tried to re-log i was repeatedly told "username or password is incorrect." i changed my password and was told the same thing repeatedly. i was duo with someone else who lives in the same home as myself, and they didn't have this problem. i was just wondering if i get back the 19 LP i lost since my team had to remake as it was impossible for me to log back in. any help appreciated. thankyou.

replies.body:
Damn, it sounds like you ran into a combination of different problems that lead to losing that LP but I appreciate you taking it well.  The login error you were having is an issue we've been tracking, and seems to be caused by a patch mismatch.  Per the [sticky](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password), restarting your client should get you to the current patch otherwise the manual steps can help too.  

There may be a more serious problem though, if this all started with a bugsplat.  This can be caused by bad drivers, hardware, or game files.  My suggestion would be to go through each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide just to make sure everything is okay.

To be honest, it's unlikely that we can recover your LP.  Doing so could cause issues with the ladder system and matchmaking service, but you can hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) just in case.  I can't make any guarantees, though.  Hope all that helps clear things up, and helps!
i waited a full 12 hours as i heard others were having the same issue. i had to launch the full client repair to get it to reset. and thankyou so much for the response, it helps immensely.
